title: [LFM] Looking for members to join ranked team (Silver or higher))
body:
Looking for a group of silver or higher ranked players to join me in a some what serious ranked team. 
Where we can play often throughout the week and climb ranks. 
Communication preference Skype.
Positions available are

* Top:
* Jungle:
* Mid
* ADC: *Taken*
* Support

(Note - Roster will fill as people apply for positions).

If interested add me on League, IGN: Dumbledore or reply to post.

replies.body:
Hi 

I am silver 5 this season silver 4 last season. I main support. Second role can be top.

I am at uni so I can probably do 1-2 hours a night and 3-4 hours on the weekend.

Hi, I am a season 4 silver 5 player but I have coached 2 people and they have gone to plat. I am looking to improve myself and think this may be a good opportunity, I still need to sort out the travel insurance on my laptop since it got stolen while I was in the States, so meanwhile you can look for more people, but once I get it back I should have around 8 hrs a day at least. I main mid and have support as my secondary role. Qwertyuiopman
